received.reply:

Please call emergency services or have someone take you to the nearest hospital right away. Your health is the top priority right now.

These symptoms could indicate a heart attack or other cardiovascular problems, which require immediate medical attention.

It's very important that you call emergency services now and inform them of your symptoms and medical history. They will be able to provide you with the care you need right away. Please take care of yourself, and don’t delay in seeking help.
